thread.title: Giles Graves

author: Giles Graves
title: Giles Graves
text:
1.Made the appointment - seemed too easy
2.Early on morning of the appointment day I received an email with 2hr window expected arrival time
3. Guy phoned when 20 mins away
4. Arrived and I handed over the security nut
5. Left him to it, hour or so later job done!
6. Email received with job report and the receipt
Very pleased, will use again!
